ingredients.text: 1/4 to 1/3 large block silken or firm tofu, about 4 ounces
2 teaspoons sweet, light miso, preferably Saikyo miso
14 ounces silken tofu divided into 4 blocks

1 small green bell pepper, finely chopped
1 small red bell pepper, finely chopped

ingredients.text: Kosher salt and freshly ground white pepper, to taste
Kosher salt and freshly ground white pepper, to taste

roughly chopped coriander and lime wedges, to serve

extras: whatever buns & condiments you like. I did a combination of goat cheese and homemade pickles. You could also do a lettuce wrap in place of buns. And I couldn't resist the mini brioche buns from La Boulange.
